channel.title: CVE Feed for CRM Perks -- Integration for Salesforce and Contact Form 7, WPForms, Elementor, Ninja Forms
channel.description: The latest CVEs for CRM Perks -- Integration for Salesforce and Contact Form 7, WPForms, Elementor, Ninja Forms

item.title: CVE-2023-37982|2024-08-02T17:23:27.772Z -- crm%20perks -- integration%20for%20salesforce%20and%20contact%20form%207%2C%20wpforms%2C%20elementor%2C%20ninja%20forms
item.description: URL Redirection to Untrusted Site ('Open Redirect') vulnerability in CRM Perks Integration for Salesforce and Contact Form 7, WPForms, Elementor, Ninja Forms.This issue affects Integration for Salesforce and Contact Form 7, WPForms, Elementor, Ninja Forms: from n/a through 1.3.3.
